name: guttural
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
(of speech sounds) produced at the back of the throat and therefore deep: Two Egyptians were arguing outside the room, their voices loud and guttural.
Thesaurus: synonyms, antonyms, and examples
near the bottom of a range of soundslowThose notes are too low for me.low-pitchedThe low-pitched rumble of the train shook the house.gutturalArabic contains guttural sounds that are difficult for non-Arabic speakers to say properly.throatyShe gave a loud, throaty laugh.
